::Dark Lavacons::

          The Dark Lavacons watched as the fighting kept=
 on.  Now, it was their turn.  

            The sky turned black.  Dark fl=
ame started appearing.

         Astral flew up, and formed his part of....=
...Dark Lavatron.

          Fenox flew up and formed his part.  Griplash a=
nd Starlight formed their parts of Dark Lavatron, and then Recklessa flew u=
p to form her part.

         All the parts connected, and their was Dark L=
avatron.  Dark Lavatron stomped one foot on the ground, and there was a bur=
st of dark flame.  Dark Lavatron laughed, and then fired dark optic heat la=
zers at Jetstorm.
